data.text: Yaa Waaqi, ani kooluu sitti galeeraatii,
Qulqulloonni lafa irraa garuu ulfina qabeeyyii dha;
Waaqayyo qooda dhaala kootii fi qooda xoofoo koo ti;
Funyoon daangaa iddoo gaarii naa buʼeera;
Waaqayyo isa na gorsu sana ani nan jajadha;
Ani yeroo hunda fuula koo duraa Waaqayyoon qaba.
Kanaaf garaan koo ni gammada; arrabni koos ni ililcha;
ati siiʼool keessatti na hin dhiiftuutii,
Ati karaa jireenyaa na barsiifta; fuula kee durattis
